summary.para: Specifies which field is to receive the focus when the property page is activated.

param.name: dispID
param.para: The property that is to receive the focus.

returns.para: This method can return the following values.

description.para: This method is not currently implemented; the interface is probably provided in anticipation of future work on this page.

remarks.para: If this method is called before a page is activated, the page should store the property and set the focus to it in the next call to . If the page is already active, EditProperty should set the focus to the specific property field.

summary.para: An extension to to support initial selection of a property on a page.

This method works in conjunction with the implementation of on an object that supplies properties and specifies property pages through . This interface has only one extra method in addition to those in . That method, tells the page which property to highlight.
